name: Ancestor Worship
uniques: [+1 Faith] per [5] population [in all cities]
[+2 Culture, 2 Faith] from all [Library] buildings

name: Earth Mother
uniques: [+1 Faith, +1 Production] from all [Monument] buildings
[+1 Faith, +1 Culture] from [Mine] tiles [in all cities] <in [Strategic resource] tiles>
[+1 Faith, +1 Culture] from [Mine] tiles [in all cities] <in [Strategic resource] tiles>
[+1 Faith, +1 Culture] from [Mine] tiles [in all cities] <in [Resource] tiles>

name: God of All Creation
uniques: [+1 Faith] from all [Monument] buildings
[+1 Culture] from all [Palace] buildings
[+2 Food, +2 Production, +2 Science, +2 Gold] from every [Palace]
[+2 Food, +2 Production, +2 Science, +2 Gold] from every [Palace] <starting from the [Classical era]>

name: God of the Stars and Sky
uniques: [+1 Culture, +1 Food, +1 Faith] from every [Strategic resource] <in [Tundra] tiles>
[+1 Culture, +1 Gold, +1 Food, +1 Faith] from every [Bonus resource] <in [Tundra] tiles>
[+1 Culture, +1 Gold, +1 Food, +1 Faith] from every [Luxury resource] <in [Tundra] tiles>

name: Spirit of the Desert
uniques: [+3 Food] from every [Oasis]
[+1 Gold, +1 Production, +1 Faith] from every [Strategic resource] <in [Desert] tiles>
[+1 Gold, +1 Production, +1 Faith] from every [Bonus resource] <in [Desert] tiles>
[+1 Gold, +1 Production, +1 Faith] from every [Luxury resource] <in [Desert] tiles>

name: Tulteary Gods
uniques: [+3 Production, +2 Gold, +1 Faith] <in cities with at least [3] [Population]>
[+1 Production, +1 Faith] from all [Workshop] buildings
[+1 Production, +1 Faith] from all [Windmill] buildings
[+2 Production, +2 Faith] from all [Factory] buildings
